name: resource_identifier
displayName: Unique identifier of the resource used for identification within the NFDI4Health.

name: classification
dataverseAlias: Classification of the resource within the predefined categories
displayName: Group of items providing Information about classification of the resource within the predefined categories.

name: classification_type
displayName: A term describing the resource. You can register a study, a study protocol, a questionnaire, etc.

name: typeGeneral
dataverseAlias: In what form is the [RESOURCE] available?
displayName: Specific information about the form in which the [RESOURCE] is available. You can select "Text" for most of the study documents, e.g. for questionnaires, informed consent forms, case report forms, etc.

name: titles
displayName: Group of items providing Information about title(s)/name(s) of the [RESOURCE].

name: titles_text
displayName: Scientific unabbreviated title or name of the [RESOURCE]. Please provide at least one title/name of the [RESOURCE]. If the original title is not in English, please also provide an English translation of the original title.

name: acronyms
displayName: Group of items providing Information about acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE].

name: acronyms_text
displayName: If existing, acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE]. The property refers primarily to studies which often have an acronym. For other types of resources, a short title (preferably up to 5 words) can be provided, e.g. "NAKO-COVID Questionnaire".

name: descriptionEnglish
displayName: Group of items with an English description of the [RESOURCE].

name: descriptionEnglish_text
displayName: A short plain text summary describing the [RESOURCE] in English.

name: descriptionsNonEnglish
displayName: Group of items with description(s) of the [RESOURCE] written not in English.

name: descriptionsNonEnglish_text
displayName: Short plain text summary of the [RESOURCE] other than in English.

name: keywords
displayName: Group of items providing Information about keywords describing the [RESOURCE].

name: label
displayName: Keyword(s) describing the [RESOURCE]. Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT.

name: code
displayName: If known, the code of the keyword in a classification/vocabulary. If found, the code from the classification/vocabulary used.

name: languages
displayName: Language(s) in which the [RESOURCE] is conducted/provided. Select all that apply.

name: webpage
displayName: If existing, a link to the web page directly relevant to the [RESOURCE].

name: nonStudyDetails
displayName: Group of items applicable only to the resources which are not a study/substudy, a dataset, a registry, or a secondary data source.

name: version
displayName: If applicable, the version number of the [RESOURCE].

name: format
displayName: The file format of the [RESOURCE] (E.g., XML, PDF, XLSX, etc.).

name: useRights
dataverseAlias: Information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing Information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].

name: useRights_label
displayName: License defining the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list. If “Other” is selected, an explanation of the (re-)use terms and conditions has to be provided in the field “Additional information about use rights”.

name: confirmations
dataverseAlias: Important information about licensing, if a Creative Commons license is selected.
displayName: Group of items applicable if a Creative Commons license is selected.

name: authority
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors have authority to license the [RESOURCE]?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors have authority to license the [RESOURCE].

name: terms
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors have read and understood the terms of the chosen license?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors have read and understood the terms of the chosen license.

name: irrevocability
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is irrevocable?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is not revocable.

name: supportByLicensing
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors allow NFDI4Health to license the document?
displayName: Confirmation that NFDI4Health is allowed to license the document, i.e. to mark the [RESOURCE] with the license information.

name: useRights_description
displayName: Any additional descriptive information explaining terms and conditions to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].

name: contributors
displayName: Group of items providing information about person(s), group(s) of persons or institution(s)/organisation(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].

name: nameType
dataverseAlias: Is it a personal or organisational contribution?
displayName: Personal or organisational/group contribution. Personal or organisational/group contribution.

name: organisational
displayName: Group of items providing information about group(s) of persons, institution(s) or organisation(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE]. Organisational name can be used to denote a research group or an institution.

name: organisational_type
displayName: Contributor type an organisation, institution or group fulllfils. For example, this can be a sponsor of the study or a group of authors of the document. Which contributor type does the organisation/institution/group/etc. fulllfil? Select one value from the list.

name: fundingIds
displayName: Identifier(s) assigned by a funder to the [RESOURCE]. If available, you can enter funding identifiers.

name: name
displayName: Name of the organisation, institution or group.

name: personal
displayName: Group of items providing information about person(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].

name: personal_type
displayName: Contributor type a person fulllfils. For example, this can be a principal investigator of a study or an author of a document. Which contributor type does the person fulllfil? Select one value from the list.

name: identifiers
displayName: Group of items providing information about digital identifiers of the person.

name: identifiers_identifier
displayName: Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the person. Preferably, provide an ORCID (https://orcid.org/).

name: identifiers_scheme
dataverseAlias: Which type of identifer is reported?

name: email
displayName: Email address of the person, group of persons or institution/organisation.

name: phone
displayName: Phone number of the person, group of persons or institution/organisation. Please, use the International ITU-T E.164-number structure for geographic areas, e.g. +49 (0)153 1112233.

name: affiliations
dataverseAlias: Further information about organisation(s) associated with the contributor
displayName: Group of items providing further information about the organisation(s) associated with the contributor.

name: affiliations_name
displayName: Name of the organisation associated with the contributor. If you are have already entered the name of the organistion in the field "Name of the organisation/institution/group", please repeat it here.

name: address
displayName: Address of the organisation associated with the contributor.

name: affiliations_webpage
displayName: Web page of the organisation associated with the contributor.

name: affiliations_identifiers
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers of the organisation.

name: identifiers_identifier_2
displayName: Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the organisation. Preferably, provide an identifier from ROR (https://ror.org/search).

name: identifiers_scheme_2
displayName: Type of the identifier scheme. Which type of identifer is reported?

name: idsAlternative
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering systems, e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository. If the [RESOURCE] is registered in other systems (e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository), you can provide corresponding identifier(s) here.

name: idsAlternative_scheme
displayName: Type/name of the system where the given [RESOURCE] is already registered.

name: idsAlternative_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering system, e.g. by a registry of clinical trials or a data repository. E. g., DRKS00021273, NCT04327505, etc.

name: ids
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) of the resources related to the given [RESOURCE], e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents or links to web pages. If existing, you can specify identifier(s) of any related resources, e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents, links to web pages, etc.

name: ids_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) related to, or associated with, the [RESOURCE] being registered. These can be IDs of related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc. a) Publications like journal articles usually have a DOI, e.g. 10.3238/arztebl.2020.0861. b) A link (URL) starting with "http(s)://" to a web page with any additional information can also be provided here.

name: ids_scheme
displayName: Type of the identifier of the related resource. Select one value from the list.

name: date
displayName: Date when the identifier of the related resource was assigned.

name: relationType
dataverseAlias: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)?
displayName: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B). Select one value from the list.

name: ids_typeGeneral
displayName: Type of the related resource, e.g. journal article, dataset, text, etc. Select one value from the list. For example,. a journal article, dataset, text, etc.

name: idsNfdi4health
dataverseAlias: Related (sub-)studies, study documents, etc. registered on this portal
displayName: Group of items providing information about related resources registered on this portal. Does the [RESOURCE] have any related resources registered on this portal?

name: idsNfdi4health_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) of the related resource assigned on this portal.

name: idsNfdi4health_relationType
dataverseAlias: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)?
displayName: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).

name: provenance
dataverseAlias: Information about provenance aspects of the data entry
displayName: Group of items providing information about provenance aspects of the data entry on the portal.

name: dataSource
displayName: Source of information about the [RESOURCE] and the way it was uploaded/collected.

name: verificationDate
displayName: Date on which the responsible party last verified the information about the [RESOURCE], even if no additional or updated information is being submitted.

name: verificationUser
displayName: User who last verified the information about the [RESOURCE].

name: firstSubmittedDate
dataverseAlias: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication
displayName: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication.

name: firstSubmittedUser
dataverseAlias: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication
displayName: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication.

name: firstPostedDate
dataverseAlias: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published
displayName: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published.

name: lastUpdateSubmittedDate
dataverseAlias: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication
displayName: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication.

name: lastUpdateSubmittedUser
dataverseAlias: User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE]
displayName: User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE].

name: lastUpdatePostedDate
dataverseAlias: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published
displayName: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published.

name: lastUpdatePostedUser
dataverseAlias: User who posted/published the last update
displayName: User who posted/published the last update.

name: resourceVersion
dataverseAlias: Version number of the [RESOURCE] within the portal/system
displayName: Version number of the [RESOURCE] within the portal/system.

name: nutritionalData
displayName: Indication whether nutritional data was collected by the [RESOURCE].

name: chronicDiseases
displayName: Indication whether chronic diseases were addressed by the [RESOURCE].

name: resourceDesign
displayName: Group of items providing information about the characteristics of a [RESOURCE].

name: primaryDesign
dataverseAlias: Is it an interventional or non-interventional [RESOURCE]?
displayName: Non-interventional [RESOURCE] design refers to a [RESOURCE] that does not aim to alter [RESOURCE] outcomes of interest. Interventional [RESOURCE] design refers to a [RESOURCE] that aims to alter [RESOURCE] outcomes of interest. Select between non-interventional and interventional [RESOURCE] design.

name: studyType
displayName: Group of items providing information about the [RESOURCE] type.

name: interventional
displayName: The strategy for assigning interventions to participants. Select all that apply. If "Other" is selected, please specify the [RESOURCE] type in the field "Additional information about the [RESOURCE]".

name: nonInterventional
displayName: The primary strategy for participant identification and follow-up. Select all that apply. If "Other" is selected, you can specify the [RESOURCE] type in the field "Additional information about the [RESOURCE]".

name: conditions
dataverseAlias: Primary health condition(s), disease(s) or focus of the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing information about primary health condition(s) or disease(s) considered in the [RESOURCE], or the focus of the [RESOURCE] (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).

name: conditions_label
dataverseAlias: Name of the primary health condition, disease or focus of the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Name of primary health condition or disease considered in the [RESOURCE], or the focus of the [RESOURCE] (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.). Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT (https://browser.ihtsdotools.org).

name: conditions_classification
displayName: Terminology/classification used for the health condition, diesease or focus. If used, name of the terminology/classification.

name: conditions_code
dataverseAlias: Code ---- If known, code of the health condition, disease or focus in the terminology/classification used
displayName: Code of the health condition, disease, focus in the terminology/classification used. If found, the code from the terminology/classification used.

name: groupsOfDiseases
dataverseAlias: Which groups of diseases or conditions were the data collected on?
displayName: Group of items providing information about groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE].

name: generally
dataverseAlias: Which groups of diseases or conditions were the data collected on?
displayName: 'Groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply. For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO''s ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.'

name: groupsOfDiseases_conditions
dataverseAlias: On which other diseases or conditions were the data collected?
displayName: 'Other diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply. For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO''s ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.'
blockURI: Values are based on lower level ICD-10

name: ethicsCommitteeApproval
dataverseAlias: Status of the ethics committee approval
displayName: Status of the [RESOURCE] approval from the (leading) ethics committee.

name: status
displayName: Overall status of the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: statusWhenIntervention
displayName: Specification whether [RESOURCE] participants receive intervention or have completed it but are still being followed according to the primary objective of the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: stageStopped
dataverseAlias: At what stage was the [RESOURCE] stopped?
displayName: If the [RESOURCE] was stopped prematurely, specification of the stage at what it was halted. Select one value from the list.

name: reasonStopped
displayName: If the [RESOURCE] was stopped prematurely, specification of the reason(s) why it was halted. E.g., accrual goal met / closed due to toxicity / closed due to lack of [RESOURCE] progress / temporarily-closed per [RESOURCE] design /etc.

name: statusEnrollingByInvitation
displayName: Specification whether [RESOURCE] participants have been selected from a predetermined population or enrolled by invitation.

name: recruitmentStatusRegister
dataverseAlias: Overall recruitment status of the [RESOURCE] from the register of clinical trials
displayName: Overall recruitment status of the [RESOURCE] as indicated in the corresponding register of clinical trials.

name: startDate
dataverseAlias: Start date of data collection for the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Start date of data collection for the [RESOURCE]. In case of a planned [RESOURCE], it is the intended start date; in case of an ongoing [RESOURCE] — the actual start date.

name: endDate
dataverseAlias: End date of data collection for the [RESOURCE]
displayName: In case of a [RESOURCE] with patients or other participants, it is the date when the last participant is examined or receives an intervention, or the date of the last participant’s last visit. In case of a planned or ongoing [RESOURCE], it is the intended end date; in case of a completed [RESOURCE] — the actual end date.

name: countries
displayName: Country or countries where the [RESOURCE] takes place. Select all that apply.

name: region
dataverseAlias: Regions and/or cities within a country where the [RESOURCE] takes place
displayName: If applicable, region(s) and/or city(ies) within a country where the [RESOURCE] takes place.

name: centers
dataverseAlias: Is it a mono- or multicentric [RESOURCE]?
displayName: Specification whether a [RESOURCE] is conducted at one [RESOURCE] center or at more than one [RESOURCE] center.

name: centersNumber
displayName: Number of centers involved in the [RESOURCE].

name: dataProviders
dataverseAlias: Is this [RESOURCE] occurring from one or more data providers?
displayName: Specification whether this [RESOURCE] is occuring from one data provider or at more than one data provider.

name: dataProvidersNumber
displayName: Number of data providers involved in the [RESOURCE].

name: subject
displayName: Primary [RESOURCE] subject, i.e. a person, an animal or some other type of the subject. Select one value from the list.

name: sampling
displayName: Group of items providing information about the applied sampling method. Select one value from the list.

name: method
displayName: Type of the sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants. Select one value from the list.

name: probabilityMethod
displayName: Specific type of the probability sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants. If known, select one value from the list.

name: nonProbabilityMethod
displayName: Specific type of the probability sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants. If known, select one value from the list.

name: resourceDesign_dataSource
dataverseAlias: Data sources from which [RESOURCE] data are generated or extracted.
displayName: Group of items providing information about data sources from which [RESOURCE] data are generated or extracted.

name: general
dataverseAlias: Data sources for the [RESOURCE] (e.g. biosamples, registries, questionnaires, etc.)
displayName: Different types of data sources from which [RESOURCE] data are generated or extracted. Select all that apply.

name: biosamples
displayName: Specification of biosamples collected in the [RESOURCE].

name: imaging
displayName: Specification of imaging data collected in the [RESOURCE].

name: omics
displayName: Specification of omics technology applied in the [RESOURCE].

name: dataSource_description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about [RESOURCE] data sources, e.g. indication of the data source(s) not listed in the property „Data sources for the [RESOURCE]” or more detailed description of the selected data sources. E.g., indication of the data source(s) not listed in the field „Data sources for the [RESOURCE]” or more detailed description of the selected data sources.

name: primaryPurpose
displayName: Specification of the main purpose of the [RESOURCE]. Foremost for interventional studies, please specify the primary purpose why the [RESOURCE] was conducted. For non-interventional studies, this field may be "Not appplicable" as multiple purposes may be defined as primary ones.

name: eligibilityCriteria
displayName: Group of items providing information about eligibility criteria for [RESOURCE] participants.

name: ageMin
displayName: Group of items providing information about the minimum eligible age of [RESOURCE] participants.

name: ageMin_number
displayName: Numerical value of the minimum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE]. If age is less than 1 year, please indicate a value in months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or weeks of gestation.

name: timeUnit
displayName: Unit of measurement used to describe the minimum eligible age.

name: ageMax
displayName: Group of items providing information about the maximum eligible age of [RESOURCE] participants.

name: ageMax_number
displayName: Numerical value of the maximum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE]. If age is less than 1 year, please indicate a value in months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or weeks of gestation.

name: ageMax_timeUnit
displayName: Unit of measurement used to describe the maximum eligible age.

name: genders
displayName: Gender of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply.

name: inclusionCriteria
displayName: Inclusion criteria for participation in the [RESOURCE]. If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion.

name: exclusionCriteria
displayName: Exclusion criteria for participation in the [RESOURCE]. If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion.

name: population
displayName: Additional descriptive information providing more details about [RESOURCE] population. Any information important for the given [RESOURCE] population can be specified here.

name: resourceDesign_targetSampleSize
displayName: Intended number of observational units for the whole [RESOURCE] (e.g. intended number of [RESOURCE] participants at all [RESOURCE] sites). Enter “-1” if target sample size was not set or is unknown.

name: obtainedSampleSize
displayName: Obtained number of observational units for the whole [RESOURCE] (e.g. obtained number of [RESOURCE] participants at all [RESOURCE] sites). The value is only available after the end of recruitment. Enter “-1” if obtained sample size is unknown.

name: hypothesis
dataverseAlias: Research questions and/or hypothesis underlying the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Statement of the research questions and/or hypotheses underlying the [RESOURCE].

name: arms
displayName: Group of items providing information about arms of the [RESOURCE].

name: arms_label
displayName: Short name used to identify the arm.

name: arms_type
displayName: Role of the given arm in the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: arms_description
displayName: Additional descriptive information about the given arm.

name: groups
displayName: Group of items providing information about groups/cohorts of the [RESOURCE].

name: groups_label
displayName: Short name used to identify the group.

name: groups_description
displayName: Additional descriptive information about the given group.

name: interventions
displayName: Group of items providing information about [RESOURCE] interventions.

name: interventions_name
displayName: A short descriptive name of the intervention. If the same intervention is associated with more than one arm, provide the information once and use the field "Name of the arm associated with the given intervention" to associate it with more than one arm.

name: interventions_type
displayName: General type of the given intervention.

name: interventions_description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given intervention.

name: armsLabel
dataverseAlias: Name of the arm(s) associated with the given intervention
displayName: Name of the [RESOURCE] arm(s) associated with the given intervention.

name: exposures
displayName: Group of items providing information about [RESOURCE] exposures.

name: exposures_name
displayName: A short descriptive name of the exposure. If the same exposure is associated with more than one group, provide the information once and use the field "Name of the group associated with the given exposure" to associate it with more than one group.

name: exposures_type
displayName: General type of the given exposure.

name: exposures_description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given exposure.

name: groupsLabel
dataverseAlias: Name of the group(s) associated with the given exposure
displayName: Name of the [RESOURCE] group(s) associated with the given exposure.

name: outcomes
displayName: Group of items providing information about outcome measure(s).

name: title
displayName: Name of the outcome measure. For non-interventional studies, this can be the name of specific measurement(s) or observation(s) used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment. For a non-interventional studies, this can be specific measurement(s) or observation(s) used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment.

name: outcomes_description
displayName: Additional descriptive information about the given outcome.

name: outcomes_type
displayName: Type of the outcome measure. Primary or secondary outcome measure?

name: timeFrame
displayName: Description of the time point(s) at which the measurement for the outcome is assessed, e.g. the specific duration of time over which each participant is assessed.

name: comment
displayName: Any additional information about specific aspects of the [RESOURCE] that cannot be captured by other fields. Any additional information about specific aspects of the [RESOURCE] that cannot be captured by other fields.

name: dataSharingPlan
displayName: Group of items providing information about the data sharing strategy of the [RESOURCE].

name: dataSharingPlan_generally
dataverseAlias: Is it planned to share the data?
displayName: Indication whether there is a plan to make data collected in the [RESOURCE] available. In case of a [RESOURCE] with patients or other individuals, this refers to individual participant data (IPD). Select one value from the list.

name: supportingInformation
dataverseAlias: Supporting documents available in addition to the data
displayName: Supporting information/documents which will be made available in addition to the [RESOURCE] data. Select all that apply.

name: dataSharingPlan_timeFrame
dataverseAlias: When and for how long will the data be available?
displayName: Indication when the data and, if applicable, supporting documents will become available and for how long.

name: accessCriteria
displayName: Indication by what access criteria data will be shared, including: a) with whom, b) for what types of analyses, and c) by what mechanism. E.g., with whom, for what types of analyses and by what mechanism the data will be shared.

name: dataSharingPlan_description
displayName: Additional descriptive information providing more details about the data sharing, e.g. indication what data in particular will be shared or why the data will not be shared or why it is not yet decided. E.g., indication what data in particular will be shared or why the data will not be shared or why it is not yet decided

name: datashield
displayName: Indication, whether the DataSHIELD/Opal infrastructure is available.

name: url
dataverseAlias: Web page with additional information about data sharing
displayName: If existing, a link to the web page where additional information about data sharing can be found.

name: recordLinkage
dataverseAlias: Is record linkage with other data sources possible?
displayName: Indication if record linkage is possible.

name: resourceDesign_nonInterventional
dataverseAlias: Information about specific aspects of a non-interventional [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing information about specific aspects of a non-interventional [RESOURCE].

name: timePerspectives
displayName: Temporal design of the [RESOURCE], i.e. the relationship of observation period to time of participant enrollment. Is it a retrospective, prospective or cross-sectional [RESOURCE]?

name: targetFollowUpDuration
displayName: If applicable, anticipated time period over which each participant was followed.

name: targetFollowUpDuration_number
displayName: Numerical value of the target follow-up duration.

name: frequency
displayName: The number of follow-ups conducted within the specified duration.

name: biospecimenRetention
dataverseAlias: Which biosamples are retained in a biorepository?
displayName: Indication whether samples of biomaterial from [RESOURCE] participants are retained in a biorepository. Select all that apply.

name: biospecimenDescription
displayName: Additional information about biosamples to be retained, i.e. which specific types of biospecimens will be retained (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.). Which specific types of biosamples will be retained (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.)?

name: resourceDesign_interventional
dataverseAlias: Information about specific aspects of an interventional [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing information about specific aspects of an interventional [RESOURCE].

name: phase
displayName: If applicable, numerical phase of the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: masking
dataverseAlias: Information about masking of intervention(s) assignment
displayName: Group of items providing information about the masking of intervention(s) assignment.

name: masking_general
dataverseAlias: Is masking of intervention(s) assignment implemented?
displayName: Indication, whether a masking (or blinding) of intervention(s) assignment is implemented (i.e., whether someone is prevented from having knowledge of the interventions assigned to individual participants).

name: roles
displayName: If masking is implemented, the party(ies) who are masked. Select all that apply.

name: masking_description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about masking (e.g. information about other parties who may be masked). If needed, additional information about masking, e.g. other parties who may be masked.

name: allocation
dataverseAlias: Type of allocation of participants to an arm
displayName: Type of allocation/assignment of individual [RESOURCE] participants to an arm. Select one value from the list.

name: offLabelUse
dataverseAlias: Off-label use of a drug product
displayName: Unapproved (off-label) use of a drug product. Select "Yes" or "No" only for a drug [RESOURCE] and "Not applicable” for all other studies.

name: useRights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-NC 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial 4.0 International)

name: useRights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International)

name: useRights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial Share Alike 4.0 International)

name: relationType
dataverseAlias: A is new version of B

name: relationType
dataverseAlias: A is previous version of B

name: relationType
dataverseAlias: A is variant form of B

name: relationType
dataverseAlias: A is original form of B

name: idsNfdi4health_relationType
dataverseAlias: A is new version of B

name: idsNfdi4health_relationType
dataverseAlias: A is previous version of B

name: idsNfdi4health_relationType
dataverseAlias: A is variant form of B

name: idsNfdi4health_relationType
dataverseAlias: A is original form of B

name: verificationUser
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: firstSubmittedUser
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: firstPostedUser
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: lastUpdateSubmittedUser
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: lastUpdatePostedUser
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: generally
dataverseAlias: Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period (XVI)

name: generally
dataverseAlias: Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities (XVII)

name: generally
dataverseAlias: Diseases of the blood or blood-forming organs and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism (III)

name: generally
